mapper.select: SELECT m.*, mc.id 'mc.id',mc.name 'mc.name',mc.deleted 'mc.deleted', com.id 'com.id',com.name 'com.name',com.deleted 'com.deleted', k.id 'k.id',k.name 'k.name',k.deleted 'k.deleted', gen.id ' gen.id',gen.name 'gen.name',gen.deleted 'gen.deleted', coun.id 'coun.id',coun.name 'coun.name',coun.iso 'coun.iso',coun.deleted 'coun.deleted', lan.id 'lan.id',lan.name 'lan.name',lan.iso 'lan.iso',lan.deleted 'lan.deleted', mcastr.cast_id 'mcastr.cast_id',mcastr.movie_id 'mcastr.movie_id',mcastr.character 'mcastr.character',mcastr.order 'mcastr.order',mcastr.deleted 'mcastr.deleted', mcrewr.crew_id 'mcrewr.crew_id',mcrewr.movie_id 'mcrewr.movie_id',mcrewr.department 'mcrewr.department',mcrewr.job 'mcrewr.job',mcrewr.deleted 'mcrewr.deleted' FROM movie_metadata m LEFT JOIN movie_collection mc ON m.belongs_to_collection=mc.id LEFT JOIN movie_keyword_relation mkr ON m.id=mkr.movie_id LEFT JOIN keywords k ON mkr.keyword_id=k.id LEFT JOIN movie_company_relation mcompanyr ON m.id=mcompanyr.movie_id LEFT JOIN companies com ON mcompanyr.com_id=com.id LEFT JOIN movie_genres_relation mgenrer ON m.id=mgenrer.movie_id LEFT JOIN genres gen ON mgenrer.genre_id=gen.id LEFT JOIN movie_country_relation mcounr ON m.id=mcounr.movie_id LEFT JOIN countries coun ON mcounr.country_id=coun.id LEFT JOIN movie_language_relation mlanr ON m.id=mlanr.movie_id LEFT JOIN language lan ON mlanr.language_id=lan.id LEFT JOIN movie_cast_relation mcastr ON m.id=mcastr.movie_id LEFT JOIN person per ON mcastr.cast_id=per.id LEFT JOIN movie_crew_relation mcrewr ON m.id=mcrewr.movie_id LEFT JOIN person per1 ON mcrewr.crew_id=per1.id WHERE m.title=#{title}
